title: Gold 4 team looking for top and adc mains
body:
I am looking for a top main and an adc main who are keen to commit to my team. The players we have at the moment are nice and have good attitudes. We communicate a lot and we spend time to make team comps and organize picks and bans. I wish to make this team legit as in be in diamond for r5. At the moment we have a plat 1, diamond 5, plat 5 and a plat 4. In saying this players must be at least Plat. 

Please you must be available at 8pm on weekdays, weekends are a bit hard to pin point exactly when we will play but if you communicate to me when you think you will be home that would help. You must be 18+ ( this is because I am done with dealing with trolls).

We are a serious team, I am easy going and if people upset you I do deal with it. You won't be raged at, you will find we are a group of boys who are good mates even though most of us met over the net.

Please have skype and add me my ign is skt1 DemonSlayer

replies.body: Im a gold 1 player who doesnt play much solo q, but outta 44 solo games i've won 33 this season (75%). I main mid and adc, add me back if your interested.
I can to lane for you guys, gold 5 atm (plan to be play in next two weeks ago)
Hey man I'm S4 player but I play a lot of champs so i'm confident I could climb higher. I main top reply if interested.
